original_text: He took also of the seed of the land, and planted it in a fruitful field; he placed it by great waters, and set it as a willow tree.
korean_text: 또 그 땅의 종자를 꺾어 옥토에 심되 수양버들 가지처럼 큰 물 가에 심더니

sentences.original_text: He took also of the seed of the land
and planted it in a fruitful field
he placed it by great waters
and set it as a willow tree
